name: Fang In Emerald Valley
description:
Fang In Emerald Valley

The Sequel To Sonic In Ocean Valley

Starting Fang The Sniper, Bean The Dynamite, Sonic The Hedgehog And My Sonic OC Dash The Fox

Date: January 1st 2020

Control

Arrow Keys To Move

Spacebar To Jump

Enter To Change Character

Story/Plot

After The Event Of Sonic In Ocean Valley, Where Sonic & Dash Destroy Fang In Dr.Robotnik Machine, Fang Think It Look Like He Failed His Job As Dr.Robotnik Replacement, Even That He Tried His Best To Stop Sonic & His New Friend Dash, Fang Quit Being With Dr.Robotnik And Goes Back To His Old Adventure.
Three Years Later
Fang Is Back With his Old Hobby Being On Bounty Hunting
Dr.Robotnik Hired Metal Sonic To Be A New Replacement For Him To Take Over The Universe & Destroyed Sonic & Dash.
Sonic & Dash Almost Get Kidnapped By Metal Sonic But Luckily Bean Saved Them From Being Kidnapped By Metal Sonic & Called His Friend Fang To Work With Sonic & Dash
Now That Two Bad Guy Like Fang & Bean & Two Good Guy Sonic & Dash They All Working Together To Stop Metal Sonic & Save The Universe From Chaos.
